entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 18.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the afternoon then clearing. Wind north 20 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 18. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 29 in the evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023
